publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-565# Colin Fox: From Oxgangs to Africa Housing Initiative-That the Parliament welcomes plans initiated by community leader Mr Jackie Laird and the people of Oxgangs in Edinburgh to transport fixtures and fittings from three, soon to be demolished, tower blocks in the area to Nigeria and Sierra Leone where they will be used to build villages for orphans and offers its full support to this initiative hoping that it helps to further greater understanding, solidarity and co-operation between African and Scottish peoples.
S2M-565# From Oxgangs to Africa Housing Initiative (lodged on 5 November 2003) Alex Neil*, Bill Butler*

S2M-565# Colin Fox: From Oxgangs to Africa Housing Initiative-That the Parliament welcomes plans initiated by community leader Mr Jackie Laird and the people of Oxgangs in Edinburgh to transport fixtures and fittings from three, soon to be demolished, tower blocks in the area to Nigeria and Sierra Leone where they will be used to build villages for orphans and offers its full support to this initiative hoping that it helps to further greater understanding, solidarity and co-operation between African and Scottish peoples. Supported by: Alex Neil, Bill Butler
S2M-565# From Oxgangs to Africa Housing Initiative (lodged on 5 November 2003) Donald Gorrie*, Tommy Sheridan*
S2M-565# From Oxgangs to Africa Housing Initiative (lodged on 5 November 2003) Mike Pringle*, Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-565# From Oxgangs to Africa Housing Initiative (lodged on 5 November 2003) Ms Sandra White*, Mr Mark Ruskell*
S2M-565# From Oxgangs to Africa Housing Initiative (lodged on 5 November 2003) Pauline McNeill*
S2M-565# From Oxgangs to Africa Housing Initiative (lodged on 5 November 2003) David McLetchie*
S2M-565# From Oxgangs to Africa Housing Initiative (lodged on 5 November 2003) Sarah Boyack*
S2M-565# From Oxgangs to Africa Housing Initiative (lodged on 5 November 2003) Elaine Smith*
